title: RIOT we need to spread information on illegal botting
body: You need to erect awareness of the obviously ever-growing population of bots in peoples games. Not everyone understands when there is a retarded bot in their game that feeds 1 death a minute on average. You need to spread awareness so these accounts can get banned so we can rid the community of the unnecessary anchors in unfortunate peoples games.

replies.body:
Inb4 no reply. No joke.

OCE the forsaken server.
